verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to me all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast: <S%H929><s%> it is mine.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Remember <S%H2142><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you came <S%H3318><s%> out from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%> for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from this <S%H2088><s%> place: there shall no <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
This day <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> you out in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib. <S%H24><s%>

And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you, a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> that you shall keep <S%H5647><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> service <S%H5656><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and there shall no <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread be seen <S%H7200><s%> with you, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be leaven <S%H7603><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> with you in all <S%H3605><s%> your quarters. <S%H1366><s%>

And you shall show <S%H5046><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This is done because <S%H5668><s%> of that which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to me when I came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> to you on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> between <S%H996><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> may be in your mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> in his season <S%H4150><s%> from year <S%H3117><s%> to year. <S%H3117><s%>

And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> as he swore <S%H7650><s%> to you and to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and shall give <S%H5414><s%> it you,

That you shall set apart <S%H5674><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that opens <S%H6363><s%> the matrix, <S%H7358><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> firstling <S%H6363><s%> that comes <S%H7698><s%> of a beast <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have; <S%H1961><s%> the males <S%H2145><s%> shall be the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> firstling <S%H6363><s%> of an ass <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb; <S%H7716><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you will not redeem <S%H6299><s%> it, then you shall break <S%H6202><s%> his neck: <S%H6203><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> among your children <S%H1121><s%> shall you redeem. <S%H6299><s%>

And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time <S%H4279><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this? <S%H2063><s%> that you shall say <S%H559><s%> to him, By strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us out from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage: <S%H5650><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> would hardly <S%H7185><s%> let us go, <S%H7971><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of beast: <S%H929><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that opens <S%H6363><s%> the matrix, <S%H7358><s%> being males; <S%H2145><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of my children <S%H1121><s%> I redeem. <S%H6299><s%>

And it shall be for a token <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and for frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between <S%H996><s%> your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had let the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5148><s%> them not through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> although <S%H3588><s%> that was near; <S%H7138><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> peradventure the people <S%H5971><s%> repent <S%H5162><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> and they return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5437><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> about, <S%H5437><s%> through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea: <S%H3220><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up harnessed <S%H2571><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> with him: for he had straightly sworn <S%H7650><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will surely visit <S%H6485><s%> you; and you shall carry <S%H5927><s%> up my bones <S%H6106><s%> away hence <S%H2088><s%> with you.
And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham, <S%H864><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them by day <S%H3119><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> to lead <S%H5148><s%> them the way; <S%H1870><s%> and by night <S%H3915><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> to give them light; <S%H216><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> and night: <S%H3915><s%>

He took <S%H4185><s%> not away the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> nor the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>
